ygData.subject: Wake up little Slayer Wake up
ygData.msgSnippet: Prebon was again sitting in his command chair. He sat forward, back slightly bent. His right arm sat firmly on the armrest with his hand curled around the end.

Subject: Wake up little Slayer Wake up
Message-ID: <90r131+d6n4@...>

User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 801
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: cyberwolf4@...

Prebon was again sitting in his command chair. He sat forward, back 
slightly bent. His right arm sat firmly on the armrest with his hand 
curled around the end. His left elbow sat on the other armrest with 
his hand held to his chin. The mighty leaders first two fingers 
tapped his lips as if in deep thought. (Classic captain Kirk pose.)

Blaze entered to give him a full report. "The operation was a 
success, Slayer will be 100% in a few days." she stepped back as if 
she were avoiding a flying object that didn't exist, "He'll regain 
consciousness shortly."

"Very good." Prebon replied, shifting his weight to his other 
hand. "I want him ready for action by tomorrow." Prebon wasn't a bot 
with much patience and wouldn't let one of his bots rest for more 
than a day unless they were dead.
